data.title: Noam Chomsky
data.text:
Avram Noam Chomsky (janam 7 December 1928) ek American linguist, philosopher, political activist, author, aur lecturer hae. Uu Massachusetts Institute of Technology ke Institute Professor aur professor emeritus of linguistics hae.

Barsky, Robert F. (1997). Noam Chomsky: A Life of Dissent. Massachusetts: MIT Press. ISBN 978-1550222821. http://cognet.mit.edu/library/books/chomsky/chomsky/welcome.html.

Chomsky, Noam (1996). Perspectives on Power. Montr√©al: Black Rose. ISBN 978-1551640488.

Kreisler, Harry (2002-03-22). "Activism, Anarchism, and Power: Conversation with Noam Chomsky". Conversations with History. Institute of International Studies, UC Berkeley .
